welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
An example of the pansexual flag overlayed on one of newt's pfp!

@ayanobot/pride

npm i @ayanobot/pride

Ayano's own pride image generator! (: View the documentation [here](https://ayano.newtt.me/#/docs/rankcard/pride/general/welcome) ### To-do - [ ] Circle border of flag colours View the license here.

classes.name: Pride
classes.description: The pride image generator, as used by Ayano!

construct.name: Pride
construct.description: Create an instance of the image generator!

params.name: width
params.description: The width to force for generated images.

params.name: height
params.description: The height to force for generated images. If this is not defined, the forced width will be used.

methods.name: overlay
methods.description: Overlays a flag onto an image from its Buffer.

params.name: imageBuffer
params.description: The buffer of the image to overlay the flag onto

params.name: flagName
params.description: The name of the flag

params.name: opacity
params.description: The opacity to set the flag to
